name: FIGHTA
description:
GDKO ROUND 6

Its crazy to get this far :)

The theme was to create a One button game that will be purely rated on audio design. Here I have put a reasonable amount of effort in so that I can try get into the next round. The problem is I will be dropping out next round due to personal reasons.

Here is my last submission to this game jam

ALL MUSIC WAS CREATED BY ME SO NO STEALING THIS FOR OWN USE (even though the music is poorly timed).
